pages.text: There's really a frenzied army in your mouth using gunpowder to bombard your mucous membranes and tongue!$(br)The restlessness and energy from the sugar makes you want to stretch your muscles.$(br)Grants the consumer Charging I (2.5 min), Speed I (2.5 min), Strength I (2.5 min)$(br)Can be consumed regardless of satiation, buff duration will stack.
